ValidationRule.description: The Company Name can not be "Unknown Trials" so that imeet trials do not convert into Accounts with that name.
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: AND( $User.Alias <> "autocln", CONTAINS(RecordType.Name, "PGi"), ISPICKVAL(Status, "Qualifying"), Company = "Unknown Trials", $User.Override_Validation_Rules__c = False, NOT($Setup.BypassRules__c.Disable_Validation_Rules__c) )
ValidationRule.errorMessage: The company name cannot be Unknown Trials when the Lead Status is Qualifying. Please change the Company Name to something else before saving.
